cause.description:
We want to show that accepting people even if they are muslim, christian, jewish, or atheist... just aknowlage it is their freedom to choose what ever they want... and think about how lucky you are to have someone who can show you a diffrent part of human society that otherwise you wouldn't know too much about.
1. Ease the tension between religions
2. Remove bigotry
cause.mission: Show that accepting religous diffrences will promote peace
cause.name: Take Cognizance of Aberration
